Zergling


Zergling listened in the conversation of the 4 maximals and the 
alliance bots. "Hmm a bomb in the engine room. I'll go check it out. 
But first, Computer, please scan the engine room for any bombs."

Computer:No bombs found. 

"Yes, Okay they might be cloaked. Check for any cloaking in the
engine 
room." Zergling knew if he deactivated the bomb, the alliance would 
have 4 prisoners. 

Computer:None found.

Zergling walked off for the engine room. He had to find the bomb. 
Zergling entered the engine room and started looking for any bombs.
